snippet.title: Sole - Coming 2019
snippet.description: Uncover the secrets of a world lost in shadow… Sole is a surreal adventure game where you play as the only source of light in a world shrouded in darkness. Wander through uninhabited environments, painting the land with light as you uncover its mysterious past.
